content: a few years ago i was on my way to the local scottish festival with a water bottle for the day but no carrier for it i brought yarn and a hook and finished it while in line since then i ve made many more for kids teachers and friends this pattern relies on a thicker fabric for more insulation from the heat of the day it also safely holds cash and cards at the bottom if you re trying to consolidate your carryings while out and about sizes s m l s = short 12 oz bottle m = 12-18 oz bottle l = 27 oz bottle materials - 1 1 2 skeins nature s choice organic cotton worsted 94 yds* - h-8 5 00mm hook - tapestry needle *as this yarn has been discontinued i recommend using worsted cotton by blue sky fibers
